attributes.action: High school students should finish an hour earlier 2:00pm
attributes.additional_details: The teens have 2 days (the weekend), to them selves to spend time with their family/parents/siblings or to hang out with their friends on the park or around the local area. And the bible references to Sunday as being a day of rest whereas teenagers have to do a lot of homework including revising and online offline homework.
attributes.background: Teenage high school students all ages year 7- year 11, School days should finish at 2:00pm an hour earlier. This is because teenagers, have a lot of homework such as revising all topics, and online/offline homework and they have to do this in their spare time and that shouldn’t be happening
